\nc<Nika>My name is Nika. It was said to me that I would
find a man named Regulus here.

is one of us and besides, those days are over now...

She is an Elven girl of Moldera. We all have a common enemy.
\nc<Sharma'nen>But Lord Leonardo, she bears a Conscript's Pendant!
\nc<Regulus>Were you not a conscript once yourself?
You were but then you were given a chance to show your
loyalty to the people and then you did, didn't you?
\nc<Leonardo>Well then. If we should cast her aside then
you should be cast aside as well. Right?
\nc<Leonardo>Good. \!So, girl...you're a conscript and you look
look like you've been in a couple of fights and pretty
weakened. I take it that you're interested in some rest,
refuge and perhaps a good hot meal?
\nc<Nika>Yes, Sir! \!That would be perfect if I am
\nc<Regulus>Good then. Rest up, eat and come see me again.
\nc<Leonardo>Oh, she returns looking to have regain her
\nc<Regulus>Well, young warrior. Since you're back in high
spirits what is it that I can do for you?
\nc<Nika>I wish to join you and spend more time with
Elvenfolk. My parents were killed by mercenaries when
I was young and my older brother murdered by a bigoted
Human Noble....not that I want revenge.
\nc<Nika>It's just that I would love to learn more about
\nc<Leonardo>Hmm...\!if you wish to join us then you must
prove your loyalty and ability to us. Will you endulge us?
\nc<Nika>Yes, I'll take on anyone you would send at me.
\nc<Regulus>Haha...\!No, girl. There are plenty of men
and women that have courage and strength. And while
we'll gladly accept anyone with those traits, I also
seek those with far rarer qualities.
orders of Knights and Warriors with all sorts of

\nc<Nika>Are you saying that the stories are true?
\nc<Regulus>Oh, yes. But the path is a long and hard one.
\nc<Nika>This definitely has my name written all over it.
\nc<Regulus>Then so be it. If you manage to master the art
of the Spellblade then you'll be able to have a chance at
becoming one of the warriors of Legend.
\nc<Nika>I have to master an entire other art first?
\nc<Regulus>Yes, that will be the only way we know that
you're ready to start training in the ancient arts.
\nc<Leonardo>It's settled then. So your first quest begins.
Down those stairs is an old pathway but it has been over
run with creatures. Clear the pathway of the Elemental
Spirits and then return to us.

\nc<Leonardo>After you have collected the three tokens and
only after you have collected the three tokens will you
then proceed to the altar deep within the Underground
Pathways. You will surrender the tokens to the altar.
\nc<Regulus>After you have submitted the three tokens, you
will receive a precious item. Return that item here.
\nc<Nika>It will be done Sir. A Fire Spirit, Water
Spirit and Lightning Spirit. Get their tokens and
proceed to the altar deep within the pathways. After
that I return here with the new item I get.

There you will find a hermit.  If and when you complete
your training with him, you will return here.
